author: The Associated Press
title: UN climate summit postponed until 2021 because of COVID-19
description: This year's United Nations global climate summit is being postponed because of the coronavirus pandemic, host country Britain said Wednesday,
content:
This year's United Nations global climate summit is being postponed because of the coronavirus pandemic, host country Britain said Wednesday.
The U.K. government said the meeting, due to take place in Glasgow, Scotland, in November, will now be held next yea… [+4834 chars]
